text: The 2010 Rai Open was a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor red clay courts. It was part of the 2010 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Rome, Italy between the 12th and 18th of April, 2009. ==ATP entrants== ===Seeds=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Nationality ! Player ! Ranking* ! Seeding |- | | Daniel Köllerer | 93 | 1 |- | | Rubén Ramírez Hidalgo | 119 | 2 |- | | Christophe Rochus | 133 | 3 |- | | Jan Hernych | 136 | 4 |- | | Kristof Vliegen | 148 | 5 |- | | Albert Ramos-Viñolas | 154 | 6 |- | | Adrian Ungur | 165 | 7 |- | | Jesse Witten | 166 | 8 |} * Rankings are as of April 5, 2010. ===Other entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Flavio Cipolla * Antonio Comporto * Gianluca Naso * Matteo Trevisan The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Jesse Huta Galung * Boris Pašanski * Franko Škugor * Matteo Viola ==Champions== ===Singles=== Filippo Volandri def. Lamine Ouahab, 6–4, 7-5 ===Doubles=== Tomasz Bednarek / Mateusz Kowalczyk def. Jeff Coetzee / Jesse Witten, 6–4, 7–6(4) ==References== * *Italian Tennis Federation official website *ITF search Rai Open Category:Rai Open
title: 2010 Rai Open
